phrases.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
phrases.author: Thomas Edison

phrases.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
phrases.author: Yogi Berra

phrases.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
phrases.author: Abraham Lincoln

phrases.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
phrases.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

phrases.text: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
phrases.author: Byron Pulsifer

phrases.text: Be the chief but never the lord.
phrases.author: Lao Tzu

phrases.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
phrases.author: Carl Sandburg

phrases.text: Well begun is half done.
phrases.author: Aristotle

phrases.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
phrases.author: Yogi Berra

phrases.text: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
phrases.author: Margaret Sangster

phrases.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
phrases.author: Buddha

phrases.text: What you give is what you get.
phrases.author: Byron Pulsifer

phrases.text: We can only learn to love by loving.
phrases.author: Iris Murdoch

phrases.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
phrases.author: Karen Clark

phrases.text: You'll see it when you believe it.
phrases.author: Wayne Dyer

phrases.text: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
It's easier to see the mistakes on someone else's paper.
Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
To lead people walk behind them.
phrases.author: Lao Tzu

phrases.text: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
phrases.author: William Shakespeare

phrases.text: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
phrases.author: Henry J. Kaiser

phrases.text: A rolling stone gathers no moss.
phrases.author: Publilius Syrus

phrases.text: Ideas are the beginning points of all fortunes.
phrases.author: Napoleon Hill

phrases.text: Everything in life is luck.
phrases.author: Donald Trump

phrases.text: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
phrases.author: Lao Tzu

phrases.text: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
phrases.author: Benjamin Spock

phrases.text: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
phrases.author: Confucius

phrases.text: The day is already blessed, find peace within it.
From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
phrases.author: Sigmund Freud

phrases.text: Well done is better than well said.
phrases.author: Benjamin Franklin

phrases.text: Bite off more than you can chew, then chew it.
phrases.author: Ella Williams

phrases.text: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
phrases.author: Buddha

phrases.text: One today is worth two tomorrows.
phrases.author: Benjamin Franklin

phrases.text: Once you choose hope, anythings possible.
phrases.author: Christopher Reeve

phrases.text: God always takes the simplest way.
phrases.author: Albert Einstein

phrases.text: One fails forward toward success.
phrases.author: Charles Kettering

phrases.text: From small beginnings come great things.
Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere
phrases.author: Chinese proverb

phrases.text: Be as you wish to seem.
phrases.author: Socrates

phrases.text: The world is always in movement.
phrases.author: V. Naipaul

phrases.text: Never mistake activity for achievement.
phrases.author: John Wooden

phrases.text: What worries you masters you.
phrases.author: Haddon Robinson

phrases.text: One faces the future with ones past.
phrases.author: Pearl Buck

phrases.text: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.
phrases.author: Brian Tracy

phrases.text: Who sows virtue reaps honour.
phrases.author: Leonardo da Vinci

phrases.text: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
phrases.author: Dalai Lama

phrases.text: Talk doesn't cook rice.
phrases.author: Chinese proverb

phrases.text: He is able who thinks he is able.
phrases.author: Buddha

phrases.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
phrases.author: Larry Elder
